Report.Query: select t.fl_date, t.route_grade, t.route_id, t.route_name, t.first_run_count, t.frun_ontime_count, round(t.frun_ontime_ratio,2) frun_ontime_ratio, t.last_run_count, t.lrun_ontime_count, round(t.lrun_ontime_ratio,2) lrun_ontime_ratio, t.area_code, t.org_group, t.org_group_id from rpt_svcquality_flontime t where t.fl_date>=to_date(:p_from,'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.fl_date<=to_date(:p_to,'yyyy-mm-dd')
